Pre-Game Insights: India and New Zealand have played six games in 14 days and the T20I series is tied at 1-1.
Mitchell Santner has stressed the importance of winning a series in India for New Zealand.
Both captains, Santner and Hardik Pandya, have been big gains for their sides.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ahmedabad may not want to do what Lucknow did - its already been in the eye of a storm before - in which case India might be tempted to bring back Umran Malik in place of Yuzvendra Chahal.
Others: The Narendra Modi stadium in Ahmedabad has typically been a high-scoring venue for T20Is.
The weather is set fair for the match.
There are 44 players with a batting average above 40 and a strike rate above 130 in T20Is. Two of the top three have been on show in this series: Suryakumar Yadav and Devon Conway.
